column4: is there a good converter with a gui for it.  So you could easyly convert say an .avi to  .ogg
you may want to uninstall the one from repos first before installing
you can change the menu item to point to the newer one
if they didnt id get an alernative
find a repo with a later version (if 1 exists)
in jaunty it s a seperate app, in karmic its a proper update
you should really look into mencoder and ffmpeg though
do you want a desktop OS, if so, which do you want to use?
